name: #1Next Samuel Adam Brewery Boston mass
neighborhood_overview: Next to Samuel Adams Brewery & for flat rate I can pick you up in any place Boston also drop you off including Logan Airport or bus or train terminal
description:
Let me start by saying this is a small room with futon bed I recommend 1 person but you can fit two person if ur slim also has a private full bathroom connected to room you do not share this bathroom at all but you do share full kitchen Brewery Samuel Adams across the street also near Franklyn park zoo next to Bella Luna rest&bar also is next to shop,food,bars,barbershop,salon whole foods. also use grill.. this is nice place & area I also live here In apt 1 but guest will stay in apt 2.

The space
Just to sit deck bar or chair read or look all tourist to brewery & walking by people from work etc train station

Guest access
I have coin operated laundry, gym, deck or back yard small pool but fun refreshing

Other things to note
The orange line train station is Stonybrook stop
Also I want to make clear that it is only a sofa bed may not be very good for big people. It’s only a sofa bed

name: #8 Samuel Adam Brewery & subway into all Boston
neighborhood_overview: Zoo aquarium restaurant salón liquor store groceries train few stop to downtown and new encore casino plus lot more medical area Fenway park brewery’s more than 1
description:
This is my living room that has a closet for clothes also a dresserwith private door and lockI repeat it’s my living room also design to transform into a bedroom with smart tv heat and shared bathroom and kitchen very nice and cozy it has a sofa bed only repeat a sofa bed

The space
It has about 4 window good breeze plus a ceeling fan good view of all the street and sidewalk brewery deck

Guest access
You are allowed to use 2 deck plus 2 grilling spot hammock chairs to relax or read on the grass garden plus lots to do in area food drink bike park etc
